alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 9:27PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Callahan, southeastern Shackelford and east central Taylor Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 927 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eula, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clyde, Baird, Moran, Putnam, Eula, Potosi, Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line and I-20 Near The Callahan- Eastland County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 290 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
